column1: time_1   Sekunden nach Mitternacht UTC, begin of run
time_2   Sekunden nach Mitternacht UTC, end   of run
lon lat  Laenge, Breite, 1,2 = begin, end of run
h_a      Flugzeughoehe (GPS)
HRad     Radarhoehe
length   Laenge des Runs in km
H        Waermestrom in W/m^2
E        Feuchtestrom in W/m^2
ch4-flux in mg/m^2/d
Lraupach - Raupach length in m
Lhetero - Heterogenity length in m
TBl_W1991 thermal blending length (m) after Wood and Mason 1991, Bange (2007, habil), Eq. 4.10
TBh_W1991 thermal blending height (m) after Wood and Mason 1991, Bange (2007, habil), Eq. 4.10
TBl_M1996 thermal blending length (m) after Mahrt 1996, Eq. 25
TBh_M1996 thermal blending height (m) after Mahrt 1996, Eq. 25
TBl_M2000 thermal blending length (m) after Mahrt 2000, Eq. 15
TBl_M2000_flag flag indicating which BLheight was used for calculations (-1 = BLheight_1, -2 = BLheight_2, -3 = median over WRF PBLH along the leg)
MBl_B2007 mechanical blending height (m) after Bange (2007, habil), Eq. 4.8
MBh_B2007 mechanical blending height (m) after Bange (2007, habil), Eq. 4.8
BLheight_1 Boundary layer height, start point (m)
BLheight_2 Boundary layer height, end point (m)
BLheight Boundary layer height (m)
terrain_flag Sea-Land (1), Land-Sea (2), Land-Land (3)
WRF_PBLH_time_1 Timestep for boundary layer height from WRF model , start point
WRF_BPLH_1 Boundary layer height from WRF model , start point (m)
WRF_PBLH_time_2 Timestep for boundary layer height from WRF model , end point
WRF_BPLH_2 Boundary layer height from WRF model , end point (m)
WRF_PBLH_time_median Timestep for median boundary layer height from WRF model
WRF_BPLH_median Median boundary layer height from WRF model
local_time mittlere Zeit in Alaska Standard Time umgerechnet.
run
